summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending Sections 23.22.106, 23.44.058, 23.84.006, 23.84.014 and 23.84.025 of the Seattle Municipal Code to permit columbariums and garden wall crypts in single family zones when accessory to religious facilities, and to clarify that preliminary plats are subject to Hearing Examiner approval and not Council approval.
